item.title: Summing a Geometric Series
item.description: As is the nature of internet, I was reading something and one thing lead to another. When my conscious mind took over, I was staring at a page talking about Geometric Series, to be precise this page Mailchimp - Summing Geometric Series. Its been a while since I read something in Mathematics domain, so to exercise my brain, I thought of reading and following along with the explanation. Since I am making a conscious effort to record things more diligently, this is my attempt to understand the text.
